title: HPE CTY
content:
We recently received a mail regarding this program that’s apparently been conducted in association with the CCBD lab for a long time now.. 
Can any senior here provide insight on what the testing is like for this program to get in? And whether it’s something worth spending time on the 6th semester 
TIA

comments.body: Can you send the link please
Link for the google form? It’s closed as of now, last date to fill in was two weeks ago
Oh well they didn’t send it over to us at ece campus

I don't know much about the testing process but I do know that CTY is a route to an internship/full time offer from HPE, and HPE isn't a bad company to join now (the stock is on a slight upward trend, the hybrid cloud stuff is doing good biz and lots of interesting work is going on)
